casebody.data:
UNITED STATES ex rel. Adrina MERDINIAN, Relator-Appellant, v. Benjamin M. DAY, as Commissioner, etc., Respondent-Appellee. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. February 6, 1928. No. 255. Harry H. Hoffnagle, of New York City (V. H. Kalenderian, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Charles H. Tuttle, U. S. Atty., of New York City (S. C. Coleman, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in- open court.
